info.title: Promotions & Taxes API
info.description: The Promotions & Taxes API allows you to manage and retrieve all promotions, coupons and tax rules from your VTEX store.

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

post.description: Creates multiple coupons with different coupon codes. This endpoint has a throttling of 60 requests per minute.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

quantity.title: quantity
quantity.description: Quantity of coupons created. The value must be a minimum of `1` and at maximum `1000`. If the amount is `1`, the coupon code will be the value of the `couponCode` parameter. If the value is greater than `1`, the coupon code will receive a random suffix.

couponConfiguration.title: couponConfiguration
couponConfiguration.description: Object that contains all coupon configuration.

isArchived.title: isArchived
isArchived.description: Defines if the coupon is archived (`true`) or not (`false`).

maxItemsPerClient.title: maxItemsPerClient
maxItemsPerClient.description: Maximum items per client that the coupon can be applied.

schema.description: Array with the coupon codes that were created.

get.summary: Get Promotion or Tax by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific promotion by its Promotion ID or a specific tax by its Tax ID.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

parameters.name: idCalculatorConfiguration
parameters.description: Promotion ID or tax ID.

lastModified.description: When the Promotion was last modified.

daysAgoOfPurchases.description: Number of days that are considered to add the purchase history.

isActive.description: If set as `true` the Promotion is activated. If set as `false` the Promotion is deactivated.

isArchived.description: If set as `true` the Promotion is archived. If set as `false` the Promotion is not archived.

isFeatured.description: Insert a flag with the promotion name used in the product's window display and page.

activeDaysOfWeek.description: Defines which days of the week the promotion will applied.

items.description: Day of the week that the promotion will be valid.

offset.description: Time offset from UTC in seconds.

activateGiftsMultiplier.description: If set as `true`, it activates gifts Multiplier.

newOffset.description: New time offset from UTC in seconds.

cumulative.description: Defines if a promotion can accumulate with another one. (`true`) or not (`false`).

discountType.description: The type of discount that will apply to the promotion.

nominalShippingDiscountValue.description: Exact discount to be applied for the shipping value.

nominalDiscountValue.description: Exact discount to be applied for the total purchase value.

maximumUnitPriceDiscount.description: The maximum price for each item of the purchase will be the price set up.

percentualDiscountValue.description: Percentage discount to be applied for total purchase value.

percentualShippingDiscountValue.description: Percentage discount to be applied for shipping value.

percentualTax.description: Percentual Tax over purchase total value.

shippingPercentualTax.description: Shipping Percentual Tax over purchase total value.

percentualDiscountValueList1.description: Valid discounts for the SKUs in `listSku1BuyTogether`, discount list used for Buy Together Promotions.

skusGift.description: SKU Gift Object. Total discount on the product value set as a gift.

maxNumberOfAffectedItems.description: The maximum number of affected items for a promotion.

maxNumberOfAffectedItemsGroupKey.description: The maximum number of affected items by group key for a promotion.

applyToAllShippings.description: Promotion will be applied to all kind of shipping.

origin.description: Origin of the promotion, `marketplace` or `Fulfillment`. Read [Difference between orders with marketplace and fulfillment sources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/what-are-orders-with-marketplace-source-and-orders-with-fulfillment-source--6eVYrmUAwMOeKICU2KuG06) for more information.

idSellerIsInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any seller present on the idSeller field. If set to `false`, sellers present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

idsSalesChannel.description: List of Trade Policies that activate this promotion.

areSalesChannelIdsExclusive.description: If set to `false`, this promotion will be applied to any trade policies present on the `idsSalesChannel` field. If set to `true`, trade policies present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

marketingTagsAreNotInclusive.description: If set to `false`, this promotion will be applied to any marketing tag present on the `marketingTags` field. If set to `true`, marketing tags present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

paymentsMethods.description: Array composed by all the Payments Methods.

items.description: Object with information of the Payment Method.

campaigns.description: Campaign Audiences that activate this promotion.

categories.description: Object composed by the categories that will activate or deactivate the promotion.

items.description: Object with information of the category.

categoriesAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any category present on the `categories` field. If set to `false`, categories present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

brands.description: Object composed by the brands that will activate or deactivate the promotion.

items.description: Object with information of the brand.

brandsAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any brand present on the `brands` field. If set to `false`, brands present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

products.description: Object composed by the products that will activate or deactivate the promotion.

items.description: Object with information of the product.

productsAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any product present on the `products` field. If set to `false`, products present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

skus.description: Object composed by the SKUs that will activate or deactivate the promotion.

items.description: Object with information of the SKU.

skusAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any SKU present on the `skus` field. If set to `false`, SKUs present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

collections1BuyTogether.description: Collections that will generate the promotion, type **Buy Together**, **More for less**, **Progressive Discount**, **Buy One Get One**.

listSku1BuyTogether.description: SKU first list for the promotion **Buy Together**.

listSku2BuyTogether.description: SKU second list for the promotion **Buy Together**.

totalValueFloor.description: Minimum chart value to activate the promotion.

totalValueCeling.description: Maximum chart value to activate the promotion.

totalValueMode.description: If products that already are receiving a promotion, will be considered on the chart total value. There are three options available: `IncludeMatchedItems`, `ExcludeMatchedItems`, `AllItems`.

collections.description: Array composed by the collections that will be activated or deactivated the promotion.

items.description: Object with information of the collection.

collectionsIsInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any collection present on the `collections` field. If set to `false`, collections present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

restrictionsBins.description: The discount will be granted if the card's BIN is given.

totalValuePurchase.description: Total value a client must have in past orders to active the promotion.

slasIds.description: The discount will be granted if the shipping method is the same as the one given.

isSlaSelected.description: Applies selected discount only when one of the defined shipping method is selected by the customer.

isFirstBuy.description: Applies the discount only if it's a first buy.

firstBuyIsProfileOptimistic.description: Applies the discount even if the user is not logged.

compareListPriceAndPrice.description: If the **List Price** and **Price** are the same.

isDifferentListPriceAndPrice.description: Applies the promotion only if the list price and price is different.

zipCodeRanges.description: Range of the zip code that applies the promotion.

inclusive.description: Defines if the zip code range is included in the promotion.

isMinMaxInstallments.description: Set if the promotion will be applied considering a minimum and maximum values for installments.

clusterExpressions.description: An expression to use with clusters.

affiliates.description: Marketplace order identifier. The discount will apply to selected affiliates.

items.description: Object with information of the affiliate.

maxUsage.description: Defines how many times the promotion can be used.

maxUsagePerClient.description: Defines if the promotion can be used multiple times per client.

shouldDistributeDiscountAmongMatchedItem.description: Should distribute discount among matched items.

multipleUsePerClient.description: Defines if the promotion can be used multiple times per client.

accumulateWithManualPrice.description: Allows the promotion to apply to products whose prices have been manually added by a call center operator.

type.description: Defines what is the type of the promotion or indicates if it is a tax. Possible values: `regular` ([Regular Promotion](https://help.vtex.com/tutorial/regular-promotion--tutorials_327)), `combo` ([Buy Together](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/buy-together--tutorials_323)), `forThePriceOf` ([More for Less](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/creating-a-more-for-less-promotion--tutorials_325)), `progressive` ([Progressive Discount](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/progressive-discount--tutorials_324)), `buyAndWin` ([Buy One Get One](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/buy-one-get-one--tutorials_322)), `maxPricePerItem` (Deprecated), `campaign` ([Campaign Promotion](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/campaign-promotion--1ChYXhK2AQGuS6wAqS8Ume)), `tax` (Tax), `multipleEffects` (Multiple Effects).

lastModified.description: When the Tax was last modified.

daysAgoOfPurchases.description: Number of days that are considered to add the purchase history.

isActive.description: If set as `true` the Tax is activated. If set as `false` the Tax is deactivated.

isArchived.description: If set as `true` the Tax is archived. If set as `false` the Tax is not archived.

isFeatured.description: Insert a flag with the Tax name used in the product's window display and page.

activeDaysOfWeek.description: Defines days of the week in which the Tax will applied.

items.description: Day of the week that the Tax will be valid.

offset.description: Time offset from UTC in seconds.

activateGiftsMultiplier.description: If set as `true`, it activates gifts Multiplier.

newOffset.description: New time offset from UTC in seconds.

cumulative.description: Defines if a Tax can accumulate with another one. (`true`) or not (`false`).

nominalShippingDiscountValue.description: Exact discount to be applied for the shipping value.

nominalDiscountValue.description: Exact discount to be applied for the total purchase value.

maximumUnitPriceDiscount.description: The maximum price for each item of the purchase will be the price set up.

percentualDiscountValue.description: Percentage discount to be applied for total purchase value.

percentualShippingDiscountValue.description: Percentage discount to be applied for shipping value.

percentualTax.description: Percentual Tax over purchase total value.

shippingPercentualTax.description: Shipping Percentual Tax over purchase total value.

percentualDiscountValueList1.description: Valid discounts for the SKUs in `listSku1BuyTogether`, discount list used for Buy Together Promotions.

skusGift.description: SKU Gift Object. Total discount on the product value set as a gift.

maxNumberOfAffectedItems.description: The maximum number of affected items for a promotion.

maxNumberOfAffectedItemsGroupKey.description: The maximum number of affected items by group key for a promotion.

applyToAllShippings.description: Tax will be applied to all kind of shipping.

origin.description: Origin of the Tax, `marketplace` or `Fulfillment`.  Read [Difference between orders with marketplace and fulfillment sources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/what-are-orders-with-marketplace-source-and-orders-with-fulfillment-source--6eVYrmUAwMOeKICU2KuG06) for more information.

brandsAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this Tax will be applied to any brand present on the `brands` field. If set to `false`, brands present on that field will make this Tax not to be applied.

listSku2BuyTogether.description: SKU second list for the promotion **Buy Together**.

Possible values: `regular` ([Regular Promotion](https://help.vtex.com/tutorial/regular-promotion--tutorials_327)), `combo` ([Buy Together](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/buy-together--tutorials_323)), `forThePriceOf` ([More for Less](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/creating-a-more-for-less-promotion--tutorials_325)), `progressive` ([Progressive Discount](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/progressive-discount--tutorials_324)), `buyAndWin` ([Buy One Get One](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/buy-one-get-one--tutorials_322)), `maxPricePerItem` (Deprecated), `campaign` ([Campaign Promotion](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/campaign-promotion--1ChYXhK2AQGuS6wAqS8Ume)), `tax` (Tax), `multipleEffects` (Multiple Effects).

affiliates.description: Marketplace order identifier. The discount will apply to selected affiliates.

items.description: Object with information of the affiliate.

maxUsage.description: Defines how many times the Promotion or Tax can be used.

maxUsagePerClient.description: Defines if the promotion can be used multiple times per client.

shouldDistributeDiscountAmongMatchedItem.description: Should distribute discount among matched items.

multipleUsePerClient.description: Defines if the promotion can be used multiple times per client.

accumulateWithManualPrice.description: Allows the promotion to apply to products whose prices have been manually added by a call-center operator.

type.description: Defines what is the type of the promotion or indicates if it is a tax. Possible values: `regular` ([Regular Promotion](https://help.vtex.com/tutorial/regular-promotion--tutorials_327)), `combo` ([Buy Together](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/buy-together--tutorials_323)), `forThePriceOf` ([More for Less](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/creating-a-more-for-less-promotion--tutorials_325)), `progressive` ([Progressive Discount](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/progressive-discount--tutorials_324)), `buyAndWin` ([Buy One Get One](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/buy-one-get-one--tutorials_322)), `maxPricePerItem` (Deprecated), `campaign` ([Campaign Promotion](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/campaign-promotion--1ChYXhK2AQGuS6wAqS8Ume)), `tax` (Tax), `multipleEffects` (Multiple Effects).

lastModified.description: When the Promotion was last modified.

daysAgoOfPurchases.description: Number of days that are considered to add the purchase history.

isActive.description: If set as `true` the Promotion is activated. If set as `false` the Promotion is deactivated.

isArchived.description: If set as `true` the Promotion is archived. If set as `false` the Promotion is not archived.

isFeatured.description: Insert a flag with the promotion name used in the product's window display and page.

activeDaysOfWeek.description: Defines which days of the week the promotion will applied.

items.description: Day of the week that the promotion will be valid.

offset.description: Time offset from UTC in seconds.

activateGiftsMultiplier.description: If set as `true`, it activates gifts Multiplier.

newOffset.description: New time offset from UTC in seconds.

cumulative.description: Defines if a promotion can accumulate with another one. (`true`) or not (`false`).

discountType.description: The type of discount that will apply to the promotion.

nominalShippingDiscountValue.description: Exact discount to be applied for the shipping value.

nominalDiscountValue.description: Exact discount to be applied for the total purchase value.

maximumUnitPriceDiscount.description: The maximum price for each item of the purchase will be the price set up.

percentualDiscountValue.description: Percentage discount to be applied for total purchase value.

percentualShippingDiscountValue.description: Percentage discount to be applied for shipping value.

percentualTax.description: Percentual Tax over purchase total value.

shippingPercentualTax.description: Shipping Percentual Tax over purchase total value.

percentualDiscountValueList1.description: Valid discounts for the SKUs in `listSku1BuyTogether`, discount list used for Buy Together Promotions.

skusGift.description: SKU Gift Object. Total discount on the product value set as a gift.

maxNumberOfAffectedItems.description: The maximum number of affected items for a promotion.

maxNumberOfAffectedItemsGroupKey.description: The maximum number of affected items by group key for a promotion.

applyToAllShippings.description: Promotion will be applied to all kind of shipping.

origin.description: Origin of the promotion, `marketplace` or `Fulfillment`.  Read [Difference between orders with marketplace and fulfillment sources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/what-are-orders-with-marketplace-source-and-orders-with-fulfillment-source--6eVYrmUAwMOeKICU2KuG06) for more information.

idSellerIsInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any seller present on the `idSeller` field. If set to `false`, sellers present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

idsSalesChannel.description: List of Trade Policies that activate this promotion.

areSalesChannelIdsExclusive.description: If set to `false`, this promotion will be applied to any trade policies present on the `idsSalesChannel` field. If set to `true`, trade policies present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

marketingTagsAreNotInclusive.description: If set to `false`, this promotion will be applied to any marketing tag present on the `marketingTags` field. If set to `true`, marketing tags present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

paymentsMethods.description: Array composed by all the Payments Methods.

items.description: Object with information of the Payment Method.

campaigns.description: Campaign Audiences that activate this promotion.

items.description: Object with information of the brand.

brandsAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any brand present on the `brands` field. If set to `false`, brands present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

products.description: Object composed by the products that will activate or deactivate the promotion.

items.description: Object with information of the product.

productsAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any product present on the `products` field. If set to `false`, products present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

items.description: Object with information of the SKU.

skusAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any SKU present on the `skus` field. If set to `false`, SKUs present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

collections1BuyTogether.description: Collections that will generate the promotion, type **Buy Together**, **More for less**, **Progressive Discount**, **Buy One Get One**.

listSku1BuyTogether.description: SKU first list for the promotion **Buy Together**.

listSku2BuyTogether.description: SKU second list for the promotion **Buy Together**.

totalValueFloor.description: Minimum chart value to activate the promotion.

totalValueCeling.description: Maximum chart value to activate the promotion.

totalValueMode.description: Defines if products that already are receiving a promotion will be considered on the chart total value. There are three options available: `IncludeMatchedItems`, `ExcludeMatchedItems`, `AllItems`.

collections.description: Object composed by the collections that will activate or deactivate the promotion.

items.description: Object with information of the collection.

collectionsIsInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any collection present on the `collections` field. If set to `false`, collections present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

restrictionsBins.description: The discount will be granted if the card's BIN is given.

totalValuePurchase.description: Total value a client must have in past orders to active the promotion.

slasIds.description: The discount will be granted if the shipping method is the same as the one given.

isSlaSelected.description: Applies selected discount only when one of the defined shipping method is selected by the customer.

isFirstBuy.description: Applies the discount only if it's a first buy.

firstBuyIsProfileOptimistic.description: Applies the discount even if the user is not logged.

compareListPriceAndPrice.description: If the **List Price** and **Price** are the same.

isDifferentListPriceAndPrice.description: Applies the promotion only if the list price and price is different.

zipCodeRanges.description: Range of the zip code that applies the promotion.

isMinMaxInstallments.description: Set if the promotion will be applied considering a minimum and maximum values for installments.

items.description: Object with information of the affiliate.

maxUsagePerClient.description: Defines if the promotion can be used multiple times per client.

shouldDistributeDiscountAmongMatchedItem.description: Should distribute discount among matched items.

multipleUsePerClient.description: Defines if the promotion can be used multiple times per client.

accumulateWithManualPrice.description: Allows the promotion to apply to products whose prices have been manually added by a call-center operator.

post.description: Creates a Multiple SKU Promotion. This scenario allows to create a single promotion for multiples SKUs with the Percentage Effect.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

parameters.name: X-VTEX-calculator-name
parameters.description: Promotion Name.

parameters.name: X-VTEX-cumulative
parameters.description: Defines if the Promotion is cumulative with other promotions.

parameters.name: X-VTEX-cluster-operator
parameters.description: This header allows implementing the Promotion in multiples client clusters. You can set the value as `all` - the Promotion will be valid to all the clusters - or `any` - the Promotion will be valid to any of the clusters.

parameters.name: X-VTEX-cluster-expression
parameters.description: Cluster that will be included in the Promotion. To add multiple clusters, create a header for each one of them.

parameters.name: X-VTEX-start-date
parameters.description: Promotion start date.

parameters.name: X-VTEX-end-date
parameters.description: Promotion end date.

parameters.name: X-VTEX-accumulate-with-manual-prices
parameters.description: Condition that will accumulate the Promotion with manual prices or not.

schema.description: The file must contain the SKU ID and the percentage of the discount. The first line must have the headers `sku` and `effect`. The next lines must be the SKU ID and the percentage, without any spaces. For decimal values, use `.` as in `10.5`. This should be sent as a raw text on the request body.

isActive.description: Defines if the campaign audience is active (`true`) or not (`false`).

isAndOperator.description: When `true`, determines that all the `targetConfigurations` need to be valid for the campaign audience to be active. When `false`, determines that if at least one of the `targetConfigurations` is valid, the campaign audience will be active.

user.description: Email of the user who made the last update.

items.description: Object with information about a promotion.

lastModifiedUtc.description: Date and time when the promotion was last modified (UTC).

isActive.description: If set as `true` the promotion is activated. If set as `false` the promotion is deactivated.

isArchived.description: If set as `true` the Promotion is archived. If set as `false` the Promotion is not archived.

hasMaxPricePerItem.description: Defines if there is a maximum price per item.

isTax.description: Defines if it is a tax.

Campaigns.description: Array with campaign audiences that activate this promotion.

activateGiftsMultiplier.description: If set as `true`, it activates gifts Multiplier.

allCatalog.description: Determines if the promotion applies to all products in the Catalog (`true`) or not (`false`).

skus.description: Quantity of SKUs which activate or deactivate the promotion.

skusAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any SKU present on the `skus` field. If set to `false`, SKUs present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

products.description: Quantity of products which activate or deactivate the promotion.

productsAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any product present on the `products` field. If set to `false`, products present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

collections.description: Quantity of collections which activate or deactivate the promotion.

collectionsAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any collection present on the `collections` field. If set to `false`, collections present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

categories.description: Quantity of categories which activate or deactivate the promotion.

categoriesAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any category present on the `categories` field. If set to `false`, categories present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

brands.description: Quantity of brands which activate or deactivate the promotion.

brandsAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any brand present on the `brands` field. If set to `false`, brands present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

sellers.description: Quantity of sellers which activate or deactivate the promotion.

sellersAreInclusive.description: If set to `true`, this promotion will be applied to any seller present on the `sellers` field. If set to `false`, sellers present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.

maxUsage.description: Defines how many times the promotion can be used.

idsSalesChannel.description: List of Trade Policies that activate this promotion.

areSalesChannelIdsExclusive.description: If set to `false`, this promotion will be applied to any trade policies present on the `idsSalesChannel` field. If set to `true`, trade policies present on that field will make this promotion not to be applied.
